text: Chris Jacobs, a Republican state senator, will succeed Chris Collins, who resigned and pleaded guilty last year to insider trading charges. Jacobs had banked his campaign on the popularity of President Trump, who endorsed him. https://t.co/DHnbigmFLy

text: Steve Bing, a real estate heir who became a Hollywood producer and film financier, died on Monday in Los Angeles at age 55. A police official said he had jumped from a high-rise balcony. https://t.co/BeV7exlmPc
